config-element.description:
The files in this folder are used as example of configuration elements.
For a video explaining this example, go to http://tinyurl.com/vrovideos
Learn more about vRO at Brian Watrous' blog, www.vvork.info (that's vee-vee-oh-arrr-kay, not double-you-oh-arrr-kay).
These workflows are distributed in the hope that they will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
